title: (x) da Vinci man font - various {gang}
content:
Gidday, I am looking for a font based on the drawing of ('Leonardo Da Vinci's Man')? I know i've seen it before but I just can't put a name to the font? (letters replace the man in the circle & square thingy)   
cheers   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143027im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32507.jpg)
author: isaacn

comments.content:
Try this (it seems to have kerning problems)   
   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/hands-on-albrecht/regular/testdrive.html?s=DA+VINCI&p=72

Cheers Patricia those are pretty good examples but I found something called robino sans (after searching a few font cd's) that I think will do the trick (it means not having to fork out for another font)   
- Thanks though
